Class Order

java.lang.Object
Order
public class Order extends Object
The Order class represents a purchase order within the FurnitureStore system. Each order has a unique ID, references a specific FurnitureBase item, is associated with a Purchaser, and includes the quantity of items in the order. Orders are created when a purchaser decides to buy furniture items from the store. Order details, including the order ID, furniture item, purchaser, and quantity, can be displayed using the displayDetails method.
